text: Marilyn Beck (December 17, 1928 â€“ May 31, 2014) was an American columnist. Her career began in 1961. She wrote many articles about celebrities such as gossip. She worked for People and US magazines. Beck was born in Chicago and moved to Los Angeles when she was a child. Beck died from lung cancer in Oceanside, California, aged 85. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American columnists Category:Cancer deaths in San Diego County Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Writers from Chicago Category:Writers from Los Angeles
title: Marilyn Beck
